participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Frustrated and pragmatic, Michael expresses his dissatisfaction with life and seeks change.
participant_1.background: i hate my job. my wife spends all my money. i am 40 years old. i am planning on getting a divorce. i work as a car salesman.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and creative, Emily enjoys music and has a playful side.
participant_2.background: i love chocolate bars. i play the violin and the guitar. my father is an electrician. i play ping pong.

content.text: i am not a cashier , but i sell cars .
i play the violin and the guitar
that is cool . i am a big fan of singing music .
i like to eat fish , but i am not very good at it .
